title: Lazy Foo Productions, SDL2 Tutorials
description:

Thanks for downloading the Lazyfoo Productions SDL2 tutorial, brought to you by Pixel_Dust!

This tutorial is already provided free of charge at www.lazyfoo.net. I'm just providing this to save you the trouble of downloading them all yourself.
Please donate to Lazyfoo so they can keep making tutorials for us, and libSDL.org for making this wonderful library! And please seed to, and help spread free information to everyone!

NOTES:
> Lesson 34 is not included because it regards a feature that, as of this time, has not been implemented in SDL2. It will be included in the next pack.
> Some lessons are planned, and not completed. They will be released in a separate pack.
> No setup instructions have been included for Mac on the site. But assuming you can afford Mac, you can probably afford Game Maker too, anyway. :/
> Library packs for both VC and MinGW have been included. Sadly, the libSDL website does not have a Linux version available, so you'll have to build it from the source.
